generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Buildings are visible on both sides of the road, including one on the right with commercial storefronts.
- fence: A fence runs along the left side of the road, behind a low wall.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible at the intersections.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, showing red lights.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the road and in the background.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A silver van is visible crossing the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the side of the road.
